resources.string:
Hi, my name is Victor.
 
I love games.
 
The first game I finished was Aladdin from the Super Nintendo, one of the best experiences of my life.
 
The curious thing is that only after I got old I finished Super Mario World.
 
I also like zelda, the most amazing game to play! Seriously it's the best in the world!
 
And sometimes I even play pokemon.
 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something.
 
Once, when I was playing in Johto and with a lot of luck, I even took a big margikarp with my hands.
 
I may have exaggerated, but I caught it with an old fishing rod.
 
You must be wondering how he did it? I answer! Simple … It's just … Oops I forgot!
